front.title: •Rug Hug
front.gametext: If Luke and Chewie are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR If you have a Rebel and an alien in a battle together, you may add 4 to power only.
front.lore: Wookiees are known to be creatures of great emotion and are very protective of family and friends. Chewbacca has come to treat Luke as a member of his own family.
